remarks: Property of a strong classical state.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
stcltr1.1 $e |- ( ph <-> ( S e. States /\ A. x e. CH A. y e. CH ( ( ( S ` x ) = 1 -> ( S ` y ) = 1 ) -> x C_ y ) ) ) $.
stcltr1.2 $e |- A e. CH $.
stcltr2i $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` A ) = 1 -> A = ~H ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d x y $.
